name: EssentialsPro
0:
”Alexa, ask Essentials Pro what can I do with lemon oil?”
”Alexa, open Essentials Pro and give uses for lavender oil.”
”What can I used tea tree oil for?”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: essentials pro
des:
Essentials Pro is a guide that provides great uses for assorted essential oils. The application is made for essential oils discovery and it’s target market is beginners who want to add some essential oils to their life, but don’t know their amazing uses. Oil blends are soon to come in our next update!

Use as a companion to our fire tablet application and once you know you are an essential oils pro, test yourself with our essential oils quiz app.

Some Examples:
 - lavender
 - tea tree
 - peppermint
 - chamomile
 - eucalyptus
 - geranium
 - rosemary
 - thyme
 - lemon
 - and more...

This tool does not provide medical advice, and is for informational and educational purposes only, and is not a substitute for professional medical advice, treatment or diagnosis. Call your doctor to receive medical advice. If you think you may have a medical emergency, please dial your local emergency response phone number.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
